```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
fx = expression(x ^ 2)
df_dx = D(fx, 'x')
df_dx
x <- 3
eval(df_dx)
```

```{r}
Pa = expression(2 * (3*a + 2)^4 - 5)
dP_da = D(Pa, 'a')
dP_da
a <- 1.2
eval(dP_da)
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species))
```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_jitter(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = flipper_length_mm)) + labs(x = "Species", y = "Flipper length (mm)", title = "Species Flipper Length")
```
